about_the_game:
From Bittersweet Entertainment comes another musical masterpiece!

From cogs and pipes to pumps and gears - there's something fantastical and fun about the Steampunk genre. Now you can bring the epic Steampunk to life with a charming set of music themes, melodies and sound effects.

Features:

• 20 BGM songs, 5 short ME melodies, 3 BGS background sounds and 30 SE sound effects
* Royalty-free music for your games!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Future Steam Punk" and "RPG Maker MV - Future Steam Punk" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
